title: I'm having huge fps drops when recording highlights of my games.
body:
I don't understand why this happens, because I normally have a constant framerate. I play with minimum settings, but still can't record properly.
Any ideas?

replies.body: It sounds like you're using some type of streaming of video capture program to record that video, which might actually be eating up your pc's resources while it's recording. Try running the game without that extra software running if that's the case to see if your fps is alright then. If you keep getting frame drops without that software running, hit up our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) for the most likely fixes.
